name: Ireneus, Son of Pideioto of Methi

traits.appearance: has a distinctive posture (crooked or rigid)
traits.abilities: is hardy, hale, and healthy, but is clumsy and fumbling

personality.mannerism: Makes terrible, forced puns, and stops talking until someone acknowledges it
personality.interaction: is rude to just one member of the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Normally, at a High pitch.
voice.quirk: Responds in the form of questions
